mapper.select: -- getHouseList 동 주소를 활용해 매물 리스트를 조회한다. SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, REPLACE(b.dealAmount, ',', '') as dealAmount, a.buildYear, DATE(CONCAT(b.dealYear, '-', LPAD(b.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', b.dealDay)) as dealDate, a.roadName, a.dongCode, ( b.area DIV 3.3057 ) as exclusiveArea, a.jibun, b.floor FROM houseinfo a JOIN housedeal b ON a.aptCode = b.aptCode WHERE a.dongCode = #{dong} ORDER BY dealDate DESC

-- getHouseListByName 아파트명을 활용해 아파트 리스트를 조회한다. SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, CONCAT(b.dongName, ' ', a.jibun) jibunjuso, CONCAT(b.sidoName, ' ', b.gugunName, ' ', b.dongName, ' ', a.roadName) dorojuso FROM houseinfo a join dongcode b on a.dongCode = b.dongCode WHERE MATCH(a.apartmentName) AGAINST('+${apartmentName}*' IN BOOLEAN MODE)

SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, REPLACE(b.dealAmount, ',', '') as dealAmount, a.buildYear, DATE(CONCAT(b.dealYear, '-', LPAD(b.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', b.dealDay)) as dealDate, a.roadName, a.dongCode, b.area as exclusiveArea, a.jibun, b.floor FROM houseinfo a JOIN housedeal b ON a.aptCode = b.aptCode WHERE ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE( POINT(lng, lat), POINT(#{lon}, #{lat}) ) <= 100 ORDER BY dealDate DESC

-- getHouseDetailByAptCode 아파트 코드를 활용해 아파트 상세 정보를 조회한다. SELECT a.aptCode, a.apartmentName, a.buildYear, a.lng, a.lat, hd.dealAmount, hd.dealYear, hd.dealMonth, hd.dealDay, hd.floor, CONCAT(b.dongName, ' ', a.jibun) jibunjuso, CONCAT(b.sidoName, ' ', b.gugunName, ' ', b.dongName, ' ', a.roadName) dorojuso, REPLACE(hd.dealAmount, ',', '') AS dealAmount, DATE(CONCAT(hd.dealYear, '-',LPAD(hd.dealMonth, 2, '0'), '-', hd.dealDay)) AS dealDate, ( hd.area DIV 3.3057 ) AS exclusiveArea FROM houseinfo a JOIN dongcode b ON a.dongCode = b.dongCode JOIN housedeal hd ON a.aptCode = hd.aptCode WHERE a.aptcode = #{aptCode} ORDER BY dealDate desc limit 6
